GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
drm/nouveau: fix another off-by-one in nvbios_addr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit f223ddb6be37e8a8d285b0cf6cef8eaa7ba75a5e, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 4d4e9907ff572bb1d1c0f6913ad6e3d6d4525077. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/nouveau: fix another off-by-one in nvbios_addr
